From: wilddance_mare@...

Berserk:





Whatever this planet was, Berserk wasn't happy with it. It didn't 
suit his needs. He missed the buildings and life of Cybertron. The 
planet was organic, and it confused him. How could a robot survive 
here? He followed the edge of a forest, dirt on his heavy shoulders, 
knees and forearms. 

The clone growled at this. How as he going to get out of this?

He froze. He stood by a tree, half of his body hidden as he saw a 
group of bots walking. They were Predacon. Inside he was surprised, 
but he wasn't much of an expressional bot. He bared his teeth some, 
studying them. He took a step forward. They had to be prisioners here 
too. He needed to get to them, but he hesitated. He knew when other 
bots saw him, it was fear.
